mapper.sql: t.uuid uuid, t.name name, t.english_name englishName, t.cas cas, t.rtecs rtecs, t.un un, t.danger_id dangerId, t.expression expression, t.type type, t.flag flag, t.alias alias, t.gb_id gbId, t.property property, t.air_determine airDetermine, t.water_determine waterDetermine, t.tabu tabu, t.thesaurus thesaurus, t.symptom symptom, t.firstaid firstaid, t.defend_way defendWay, t.dispose dispose, t.store store, t.leak_way leakWay, t.traffic traffic, t.caution caution, t.bern_property bernProperty, t.main_application mainApplication, t.poision_property poisionProperty, t.seprarate seprarate, t.public_safety publicSafety, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.remark remark, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_ZHJC_HXWXP t WHERE 1=1 AND JLZT = 1

SELECT
,p.DMZ FROM YAGL_ZHJC_HXWXP t LEFT JOIN ZHJC_HWPLX p ON t.TYPE = p.ID WHERE t.JLZT = 1

SELECT
,p.CODE_NAME dmz ,f.PIC_BLOB flagFile ,m.CODEID FROM YAGL_ZHJC_HXWXP t LEFT JOIN SYS_CODELIST m ON m.CODETYPE = 'HXWXPLX' LEFT JOIN SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL p ON m.CODEID = p.CODEID AND t.TYPE = p.CODE_VALUE LEFT JOIN SYS_CODELIST_PICTURE f ON t.TYPE = f.PIC_VALUE AND f.PIC_TYPE = 'HXWXPLX' WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.UUID = #{value}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS pkid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_ZHJC_HXWXP(pkid,id,name,english_name,cas,rtecs,un,danger_id,expression,type,flag,alias,gb_id,property,air_determine,water_determine,tabu,thesaurus,symptom,firstaid,defend_way,dispose,store,leak_way,traffic,remark,sjbb,cjsj,ywxtbsid,jlzt,cszt,sjc,vercol,tbjdh,tbsjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3) VALUES(#{pkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cas,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{rtecs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{un,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dangerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{expression,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{property,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{airDetermine,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{waterDetermine,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tabu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{thesaurus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{symptom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{firstaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{defendWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dispose,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{store,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{leakWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{traffic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjbb,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cjsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{ywxtbsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jlzt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cszt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{vercol,jdbcType=DATE},#{tbjdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tbsjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_ZHJC_HXWXP t SET t.JLZT = 0 WHERE 1=1 AND t.PKID = #{value}

INSERT INTO YAGL_ZHJC_HXWXP(pkid,id,name,english_name,cas,rtecs,un,danger_id,expression,type,flag,alias,gb_id,property,air_determine,water_determine,tabu,thesaurus,symptom,firstaid,defend_way,dispose,store,leak_way,traffic,remark,sjbb,cjsj,ywxtbsid,jlzt,cszt,sjc,vercol,tbjdh,tbsjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3) VALUES
#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} id,#{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} name,#{item.englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} english_name,#{item.cas,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cas,#{item.rtecs,jdbcType=VARCHAR} rtecs,#{item.un,jdbcType=VARCHAR} un,#{item.dangerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} danger_id,#{item.expression,jdbcType=VARCHAR} expression,#{item.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} type,#{item.flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} flag,#{item.alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR} alias,#{item.gbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} gb_id,#{item.property,jdbcType=VARCHAR} property,#{item.airDetermine,jdbcType=VARCHAR} air_determine,#{item.waterDetermine,jdbcType=VARCHAR} water_determine,#{item.tabu,jdbcType=VARCHAR} tabu,#{item.thesaurus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} thesaurus,#{item.symptom,jdbcType=VARCHAR} symptom,#{item.firstaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} firstaid,#{item.defendWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR} defend_way,#{item.dispose,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dispose,#{item.store,jdbcType=VARCHAR} store,#{item.leakWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR} leak_way,#{item.traffic,jdbcType=VARCHAR} traffic,#{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} remark,#{item.sjbb,jdbcType=DOUBLE} sjbb,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.ywxtbsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ywxtbsid,#{item.jlzt,jdbcType=DOUBLE} jlzt,#{item.cszt,jdbcType=DOUBLE} cszt,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.vercol,jdbcType=DATE} vercol,#{item.tbjdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} tbjdh,#{item.tbsjc,jdbcType=DATE} tbsjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=DATE} reserve3
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE pkid = VALUES(pkid), id = VALUES(id), name = VALUES(name), english_name = VALUES(english_name), cas = VALUES(cas), rtecs = VALUES(rtecs), un = VALUES(un), danger_id = VALUES(danger_id), expression = VALUES(expression), type = VALUES(type), flag = VALUES(flag), alias = VALUES(alias), gb_id = VALUES(gb_id), property = VALUES(property), air_determine = VALUES(air_determine), water_determine = VALUES(water_determine), tabu = VALUES(tabu), thesaurus = VALUES(thesaurus), symptom = VALUES(symptom), firstaid = VALUES(firstaid), defend_way = VALUES(defend_way), dispose = VALUES(dispose), store = VALUES(store), leak_way = VALUES(leak_way), traffic = VALUES(traffic), remark = VALUES(remark), sjbb = VALUES(sjbb), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), ywxtbsid = VALUES(ywxtbsid), jlzt = VALUES(jlzt), cszt = VALUES(cszt), sjc = VALUES(sjc), vercol = VALUES(vercol), tbjdh = VALUES(tbjdh), tbsjc = VALUES(tbsjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3)
mapper.select:
SELECT
,p.DMZ FROM YAGL_ZHJC_HXWXP t LEFT JOIN ZHJC_HWPLX p ON t.TYPE = p.UUID WHERE t.JLZT = 1

SELECT
,p.CODE_NAME dmz ,f.CODEID FROM YAGL_ZHJC_HXWXP t LEFT JOIN SYS_CODELIST f ON f.CODETYPE = 'HXWXPLX' LEFT JOIN SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL p ON f.CODEID= p.CODEID AND t.TYPE = p.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
and t.name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{name}),'%')
and t.english_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{englishName}),'%')
and t.cas LIKE concat(concat('%',#{cas}),'%')
and t.danger_id LIKE concat(concat('%',#{dangerId}),'%')
and t.expression LIKE concat(concat('%',#{expression}),'%')
and t.type = #{type}
